frame.name: Encounter
frame.definition:
<def-root>This frame describes <fen>Individuals</fen> who unintentionally come together to form a <fen>Group</fen>. Alternatively, a grammatically more prominent <fen>Party_1</fen> meets by chance a <fen>Party_2</fen>, expressed as an oblique phrase.
<ex></ex> <ex><fex name="Party_1">I</fex> <t>encountered</t> <fex name="Party_2">Jim</fex> <fex name="Means">on my way to class</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Group
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Group</fen> describes the resulting formation of the <fen>Individuals</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Individuals
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Individuals</fen> are self-movers who unintentionally meet up.</def-root>

FE.name: Party_1
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Party_1</fen> is the grammatically more prominent participant in the encountering event. It can refer to either a single individual or a larger party separate from <fen>Party_2</fen> previous to the by chance meeting.</def-root>

FE.name: Party_2
FE.definition: <def-root>A grammatically less prominent participant in the encountering event. It can refer to either a single individual or a larger party separate from <fen>Party_1</fen> previous to the by chance meeting.</def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition: <def-root>Any description of the unintentional meeting which is not covered by more specific FEs, including secondary effects and general descriptions comparing events In addition, it may indicate salient characteristics of the <fen>Individuals</fen> or <fen>Group</fen> that also affect the action.</def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Means</fen> descibes the way in which the <fen>Individuals</fen> came together to form the <fen>Group</fen>.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: encounter.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to unexpectedly come upon or meet with (someone)

lexUnit.name: stumble.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to accidentally meet with (someone or something)
